title: Obama issues the "murder arrangement" for the bald eagles.
subtitle: The Obama Administration has proposed a revision of energy guidelines that may affect bald eagles but has not issued a "kill order" to thousands of birds.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Obama Administration proposed a revision of the Authority's guidelines that could affect eagles, but the President did not issue a "murder order" allowing thousands of bald eagles to be slaughtered a year.
